TopicTitle: [Video] A sneak peek at the upcoming Kerbal Space Program Movie! - And a request

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, long time reader first time poster!

I\'m working on a trailer for a (fictional) Kerbal Space Program movie. Lots of action and loud noises etc.

It\'s coming along pretty good so far but I\'m about to reach a wall. I would like to have shuttles/ships with guns/lasers/missles whatever to fire in space. I don\'t think I can learn to build them quick enough. Is any one able to provide footage of such things? Is that a thing that people do?

Anyhoo, here\'s a rough draft of what I have so far:

http://youtu.be/lj8sa91eEUs

Anyone care to suggest a name for the movie?
